channel.title: Shangri-La Client & Server!
channel.description:
[center][size=17pt][i]Shangri-La Server & Client - Eddie90210 aka Trytohaxme[/i][/size]
[b].:Features:.[/b]
[ul][li]Fully Working Clan Chat! Fully Working Barrows (Need to dig to enter a crypt)! Fully Custom God Wars! Custom Interfaces! Fully Working Clan Wars! Crafting and Herblore Added! Fully Added Duel Arena! Thieving and Pickpocketing! Full Mining & Ability to Prospect Rocks! Player and PK Following! Stable - I fixed most of the issues that was making it crash randomly Ranging & Magic have hit delays with correct animations Perfect teleporting, with correct delays, and animations Prayers working - Including piety and chilvary! Recoiling Vengeance! TzTok-Jad with correct delays, along to help him is his Healers once he reaches half Hitpoints RuneScape Wilderness levels with correct Attacking ranges Items kept on Death screen shows the items you will be protecting upon death![/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b].:Pictures:.[/b]
[img]http://i26.tinypic.com/nqth7k.png[/img]
[img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2a8gsus.png[/img]
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/9fmjyu.png[/img]
[img]http://i32.tinypic.com/21tpnl.png[/img]
[img]http://i30.tinypic.com/2aewi1e.png[/img]
[img]http://i30.tinypic.com/2zgg112.png[/img]
[img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2nitc15.png[/img]
[img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2nitc15.png[/img]
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/2ex3k91.png[/img]
[b].:Downloads:.[/b]
Client Download - [code]http://www.fileden.com/getfile.php?file_path=http://www.fileden.com/files/2009/8/30/2559711/Shangri-La%20Client%20V2.rar[/code]
Server Download - [code]http://www.fileden.com/getfile.php?file_path=http://www.fileden.com/files/2009/8/30/2559711/Shangri-La%20v2.rar[/code]
[b].:Full Client Picture:.[/b]
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/1z57r7n.png[/img]
[b].:Side Notes:.[/b] [size=13pt][i]Some of you may remember me as "Trytohaxme", only those who have been around for a while! I haven't really been into private server, in a long time so I thought I would come back for a little bit and decided to release this.[/i][/size][/center]

item.title: Shangri-La Client & Server!
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

Your really ignorant really k? I’ll critisize this piece of shit server that basically all 317 have (to this date), and ur relate it to my server? kid i made my server 4-5 months ago and released it 3 months ago, ALOT GETS DONE IT THAT TIME (hense; my project i’ve been working on for 2 months) so really, idk why you think your server is all that.

cc - most 317 have / tutorials
castle wars - simpliest shit ever.
godwars - from a different server / idea
what else is s big? oh yes
duel arena - how many people even give two shit for that?
people PK more than DUEL, so really it’s nothing big either, and as well
there are tutorials/leechable clients.

item.title: Shangri-La Client & Server!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Lewis), post:18, topic:299182”]Shangri-La is a fictional place described in the 1933 novel Lost Horizon by British author James Hilton. In the book, "Shangri-La" is a mystical, harmonious valley, gently guided from a lamasery, enclosed in the western end of the Kunlun Mountains. Shangri-La has become synonymous with any earthly paradise but particularly a mythical Himalayan utopia—a permanently happy land, isolated from the outside world. In the novel Lost Horizon, the people who live at Shangri-La are almost immortal, living years beyond the normal lifespan and only very slowly aging in appearance. The word also evokes the imagery of exoticism of the Orient.

Credits to Wikipedia.[/quote]
That’s gay, this is RSPS.

Read full topic
